ProductInfo.Features:
The mobile phone is waterproof to IP57 standards, immersible in the water for 30 minutes at a depth of 1 meter. There are many occasions like washing, cooking, bathing, etc. that we may easily wet our cellphone and the phone could get damaged in different levels. But now this waterproof mobile phone can keep this worry far away. It also has ability of dustproof and shockproof. All these functions is useful for elders or outdoor enthusiasts.
Quad band: 850MHz/900MHz/1800MHz/1900MHz, available for most places.
Big buttons and fonts, large volume, talking clock, touch light, FM radio, etc. all these are specially designed for elders.
All the function buttons except SOS button are in the front of the cellphone, which is convenient for elders to find the right buttons quickly.
Large lanyard hole design(Lanyard showed in the picture is not included). Considering that old people like to use lanyard for avoiding lost of things and their vision decreased with age, we spcially design a big hole , which allows people to use wide lanyard for more comfortable wear compared with a thin one and makes it easier for elders to put the string through the hole.
ProductInfo.Name: Docooler ARCCI CP41 Waterproof Dustproof Shockproof Mobile Phone Quad Band GSM Senior Cellphone SOS FM Radio Torch Light
